column4: What is the best method and tool to capture video via firewire in Linux?  I'd like to edit with cinelerra, but I seem to be unable to capture with it.  I can only capture in kino when I run it with sudo.

you should give gtkrecordmydesktop?  that is a pretty good screen capture program...but I'm looking for capture from the video camera from firewire
ah I see...yeah I use gtk-recordmydesktop but unfortunately I have dual monitors and the only screen capture that works well enough is seom/yukon but I cant get it to compile properly on  ubuntu
